instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2289: What is A2289? A2289 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2020 with EMC 3456, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01987..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2289</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard problem
threads.message: Hello!, i have <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2289</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> with keyboard problem, A and D keys were not working so replaced with a new keyboard just to find out that same 2 keys still not working... Any ideas?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2289</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard problem
threads.message:
Many keyboard testers available on Internet.
Choose one and do a full keyboard test.

Only two non-working keys should be keyboard issue.
Many more keys are connected in the same row, or column.
Entire line should be affected, if connector problem occurs.

Just in case, try known good trackpad board and flex.
Keyboard information goes to PCH through trackpad...

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2289</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard problem
threads.message:
Touchpad has firmware in the STM32F103B6 MCU and if incorrect keyboard is used with incompatible firmware it will cause this issue.
Keyboard and touchpad must be for the exact same model number, a lot of Aliexpress sellers don't know what they are selling.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2289</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard problem
threads.message:
[QUOTE="piernov, post: 79722, member: 1057"]
Touchpad has firmware in the STM32F103B6 MCU and if incorrect keyboard is used with incompatible firmware it will cause this issue.
Keyboard and touchpad must be for the exact same model number, a lot of Aliexpress sellers don't know what they are selling.
[/QUOTE]

Is there a solution to this other than buying random parts and testing them?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2289</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard problem
threads.message:
Getting the TP/KB from damaged machine, same model.
Peoples sell machines with broken screens for low price.
Is good to have in stock, as many other components can be reused.
